      • getInstance

        public static LoginUtil getInstance()
        Implementation of the singleton pattern. Creates LoginUtil object.
        Returns:
        instance of LoginUtil

      • createJwt

        public java.lang.String createJwt(java.lang.String username,
                                  java.lang.String secret,
                                  long expTime,
                                  java.lang.String owners)
        Creates and signs a JWT for given user. Appends additional claims like expiration date or owner.
        Parameters:
        username - name for which create the token
        secret - secret for signing the token
        expTime - in milliseconds
        owners - of an app
        Returns:
        signed token

      • verifyJwt

        public boolean verifyJwt(java.lang.String jwtToken,
                         java.lang.String secret,
                         java.lang.String owners)
        Verifies given token based on secret key, chosen algorithm and owner
        Parameters:
        jwtToken - token to be verified
        secret - secret key
        owners - owners of an app
        Returns:
        true if token is valid, false otherwise

      • extractUsernameFromToken

        public java.lang.String extractUsernameFromToken(java.lang.String jwtToken)
                                          throws GameIntegrityViolationException
        Decodes JWT, extracts username
        Parameters:
        jwtToken - token
        Returns:
        username
        Throws:
        GameIntegrityViolationException - when token is invalid

      • salt

        public byte[] salt()
        Generates secure random array of bytes.
        Returns:
        16-byte salt

      • pbkdf2

        public byte[] pbkdf2(java.lang.String password,
                     byte[] salt)
              throws GameIntegrityViolationException
        Generates cryptographic salted hash for given password using PBKDF2 algorithm.
        Parameters:
        password - password
        salt - salt
        Returns:
        secure hash for salted password
        Throws:
        GameIntegrityViolationException - when pbkdf2 was implemented incorrectly

      • isUserAuthenticated

        public boolean isUserAuthenticated(java.lang.String username,
                                   byte[] hash,
                                   byte[] salt,
                                   java.lang.String password)
        Produces hash for given password (using salt from db) and compares it to the has from db.
        Parameters:
        username - user to be authenticated
        hash - hashed password taken from db
        salt - salt associated to the user, taken from db
        password - password to be checked
        Returns:
        true if user has been authenticated

      • defaultHeaders

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response.ResponseBuilder defaultHeaders(javax.ws.rs.core.Response.ResponseBuilder rb)
        Appends default headers to the server response.
        Parameters:
        rb - response to which append the headers
        Returns:
        response with appended headers
